SOSSession.name: SOSSession
SOSSession.description: This object is automatically created for each SOS session and stores information about the session.

AppVersion.description: The version of the customer’s mobile application in which SOS is implemented.

CaseId.description: The ID of the case that’s associated with the SOS session.

ContactId.description: The ID of the contact that’s associated with the SOS session.

DeploymentId.description: The ID of the SOS deployment that the SOS session originated from.

EndTime.description: The time that the SOS session ended.

IpAddress.description: To protect the customer’s privacy, this field is now blank.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that the session record was last referenced by a user.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time that the session record was last viewed.

OpentokSession.description: The ID of the OpenTok session that’s associated with the SOS video call.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the session record’s owner.

SessionDuration.description: The amount of time that the SOS session lasted.

SessionRecordingUrl.description: The URL where the SOS session recording is stored.

SosVersion.description: The version of SOS that was used in your organization’s mobile application when this session occurred.

StartTime.description: The time that the SOS session began.

SystemInfo.description: Information about the customer’s mobile device from which the SOS call originated, such as the device’s operating system.

WaitDuration.description: The amount of time the customer waited before an agent accepted the SOS session and the call began.
